category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 17 (Human Rights Management Department)
contents: Article 17 (Human Rights Management Department) ① The President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) establishes or designates a department in charge of human rights management in order to efficiently enforce human rights management. Revised 2019. 11. 7. ② The head of the human rights management department is responsible for the following human rights management affairs. Newly established 2019. 11. 7. 1. Enactment/revision of human rights management charter 2. Enactment/revision of human rights regulations 3. Operation of human rights management committee 4. Establishment of human rights management plan 5. Implementation of human rights education 6. Implementation of human rights impact assessment 7. Relief for human rights violations Operation of systems and procedures 8. Other human rights management-related work that does not belong to other departments [Moved from Article 20, Previous Article 17 moved to Article 18 November 7, 2019]
